title: Problem when turning on -USB-C port doesn't work -Always on doesnt work -Back camera doesnt focus
content:
My always on display didn't work correctly since day one, it only works with double tap, if I always keep it on, it takes a yellowish tone, however i thought it will get fixed with a patch.

USB-C port, it failed about 6 months ago, i tried to clean it and still doesn't work.

Problem when turning on, if my phone turns off, or I reset it, I can only turn it on by connecting a cable, even if it still has battery, for example I can have 100% battery and turn it off manually, however if i want to turn it on, the power button wont work until y connect a cable to the phone.

Finally my last problem is the back camera, it doesn't focus, I need to get like 2-3 inches close to something to get an acceptable photo, if not the image is all blurry, I already forced stop the app, cleaned the cache, and used other apps.

Also I tried to contact with warranty however I can't find the way.
